name: Marlok The Wizard
description:
[Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 Submission]
[Created by Malk and Modar The Great]

Our Accursed Lands have been ruled by an Usurper King's iron fist for hundreds of years. Ages of War, Famine and Despair were a direct result of that. Seeing His Foul Acts of Terror fills You with immense hatred, and so You take it upon Yourself to dethrone the evil King Khrobaron.

The Game Features:
- Marlok the Wizard;
- Two Difficulty-Packed Episodes with Six Levels in Total with Plethora of Secrets (Find them all for a BIG SURPRISE at the End :D);
- Two Simple-Yet-Difficult Bosses at the end of Each Episode;
- Digitized Enemy Sprites for the Ultimate Retro Experience;
- Music by The One and Only, Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com);
- Gameplay and Design inspired by other Masterpieces like Doom, Quake, Pizza Tower, Wario Land 4, ULTRAKILL, ANTONBLAST and Treasure Tech!;
- 30 minutes Gameplay;
and many, many more!

(not all things are what they seem like...)
